title: Entertainment: Theme Parks (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Theme Parks subcategory within Entertainment. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: (The Japanese) Disney Resort is an amusement park that more than 24 million people visit every year.
cards.romaji: Dizun. Riz to wa, maitoshi, nisen yonhyakuman-nin ij ga otozureru y.enchi desu.
cards.japanese: ディズニーリゾートは、毎年、二千四百万人以上が訪れる遊園地です。
